name: Snake: Evolution
description:
Snake: Evolution is my take on the classic game, Snake. Control a pixellated snake as you crawl around collecting apples. But beware, with every apple you grow in length, and collision with yourself or the wall is deadly! 

In its current state, Snake: Evolution is a game similar to the classic Snake with not much else besides my own graphics and such. I have plans to add new, exciting gamemodes with my own twists in the future.
